overview: While on a leisure trip to Bangkok, Lui becomes intrigued by the various sorts or witchcrafts and black magic. Fearing for her life, lui's girlfiriend Gai-Fung turns to Master Fai Cheng for protection. A fight between the good and evil erupts, climaxed by a shocking revelation of secrets and revenge between the righteous and the demonic

production_companies.name: New East Hill Film and TV Production Company Limited

title: Exodus from Afar
